articles.title: Discarded Arsenal star among Dortmund's Jadon Sancho replacements in latest Gunners blow - Mirror Online
articles.description: Former Arsenal youngster Donyell Malen progressed through the ranks in his home country and is now a fully-fledged Netherlands international as well as a key player for PSV
articles.content:
Dortmund have reportedly identified former Arsenal youngster Donyell Malen as a possible replacement for Jadon Sancho.
 Malen was a schoolboy at Arsenal before he was picked up by PSV in 2017.

articles.content:
